Doc: A structure describing the price paid for the instrument.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A structure describing the price paid for the instrument.
 #/
record FpML5.confirmation.InstrumentTradePricing {
  quote : FpML5.confirmation.BasicQuotation

  # The date interest started accruing for the accrued interest calculation on an interest bearing security.
  couponStartDate : date?

  # The date when a distribution of dividends or interest is deducted from a securities asset, or set aside for payment to the original bondholders. From the ex-date, any dividends that are owing on the security are paid to the original owner. As a consequence of this, on the ex-date, the securities price typically drops by the amount of the distribution (plus or minus any market activity).
  exDividendDate : date?

  # Whether the accrued interest in included when the trade settles. ("true" means accrued interest is not included when the trade settles.)
  tradedFlatOfAccrued : boolean?

}

couponStartDate.Doc: The date interest started accruing for the accrued interest calculation on an interest bearing security.
couponStartDate.Name: couponStartDate

exDividendDate.Doc: The date when a distribution of dividends or interest is deducted from a securities asset, or set aside for payment to the original bondholders. From the ex-date, any dividends that are owing on the security are paid to the original owner. As a consequence of this, on the ex-date, the securities price typically drops by the amount of the distribution (plus or minus any market activity).
exDividendDate.Name: exDividendDate

tradedFlatOfAccrued.Doc: Whether the accrued interest in included when the trade settles. ("true" means accrued interest is not included when the trade settles.)
tradedFlatOfAccrued.Name: tradedFlatOfAccrued
